New Records: Domantas Sabonis set a new record with 28 rebounds, the most by a Celtics opponent since Ben Wallace matched that total in March 2002
Key Match Events: The Kings outscored Boston by 17 points in the fourth quarter
Jayson Tatum was responsible for eight of Boston's 15 turnovers
Domantas Sabonis had eight offensive rebounds
Post-Match Reflections: Jaylen Brown said the team 'deserved' the boos and groans from the crowd
Kristaps Porzingis said the team needs to 'bring up our level, bring up our energy'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Celtics' loss was a letdown after an encouraging 3-1 road trip
The team is 8-7 over their last 15 games and trails the Cleveland Cavaliers by 6.5 games in the Eastern Conference
